General.Name: IFinix Corporation
General.Description: iFinix Corporation, a diversified information technology services and solutions company. The company offers streaming, real-time market data, news, and analytics to professionals and individual investors through its suite of products. Its products include iFinix RealTime, an analysis system for traders who use the system only for information and analysis; iFinix Trader, an integrated trading suite that combines order routing, trade management, charts, analytics, news, and fundamental data from various sources into a single workstation; and eFinix, a Web enabled low level version of iFinix RealTime, which helps traders to get real time information and their positions. In addition, the company provides software development, and Web development and hosting services; and constructs commercial steel buildings, as well as operates Beach City Radio that delivers a presentation of songs featuring the greatest hits from the 60s, 70s, and 80s. Further, the company engages in the business of trading or brokerage of commodities, futures, and currencies. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Harrison, New York.
General.Address: 600 Mamaroneck Avenue, Harrison, NY, United States, 10528
